base.name: PythonScript
base.description: Executes Python statements. Values on named input ports are bound to Python variables before the statements in the block are executed. Values for named output ports are retrieved from the Python environment after executing the statements in the block.

parameter_definitions.name: dtype
parameter_definitions.description: Data type of the output signal, follows numpy syntax like: double

parameter_definitions.name: shape
parameter_definitions.description: Shape or dimension of the output signal, follows numpy syntax like: (2,3) or ()

parameter_definitions.name: user_statements
parameter_definitions.description: String representation of the user statements.

parameter_definitions.name: init_script
parameter_definitions.description: String representation of the initialization script.

parameter_definitions.name: finalize_script
parameter_definitions.description: String representation of the finalization script.
